name: Stay Inside! (JuanMarinoM)
description:
In this game play as the king you must defend your village and your people by killing the monsters. Send the villagers home, stop the monster from killing them by shooting them.

Made in unity 2020.1.12f1.

Credits:
Producers: Jorge Oñate, Karen Luna, and Juan Mariño.
Directors: Jorge Oñate(event), Karen Luna (map) and Juan Mariño(battle).
Sound and music producers: itch.io and ArcOfDream.
Programers: Jorge Oñate, Juan Mariño and Karen Luna.
Character Designer: itch.io, Superdark, The low-res artist and LimeZu.
And you, for playing the game!
